BrightBlade, Rage

* BrightBlade shook her head as she heard Gangon speak, either he was 
talking crazy or he was one big dreamer.
She sat back against the tree and popped another grape into her mouth, it 
was a sunny day...might as well enjoy it!*

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Rage looked ar Scourge in a confused and frustrated way, she could change 
with words? Simple words?
She looked down at herself and remembered the way that he had turned her 
that way, if it was like that then she didn't want to change too often.
Rage took a step back and then looked back at Scourge, but if it could 
change her back into the leathalness and twice as deadly creature she was 
she HAD to try!
She was a bit nervous but she guessed that would pass once she was back to 
normal.
Here went nothing!*

" B...Beast......Mode!"

* With no warning what so ever Rage transformed back into her Tarbosaurus 
beast form, the roar that also signaled the transformation could be heard 
for miles.
Rage shook once she was in the scales that were more familiar to her then 
the cold steel of her robot form.
The wildness of her beast form was dull but still there, it's wild taste for 
chaos and the simple need to survive was returning...but not to extent that 
it was.
Rage looked at Scourge and swung her massive head towards him, now it was 
time to go wherever it was that he was to take her.
And hopefully catch a bite to eat on the way, be it organic or robotic!*
